statements: SELECT * FROM ContentDistribution WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, engagement_metrics FROM ContentDistribution WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT platform_name, audience_demographics FROM ContentDistribution WHERE platform_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM ContentDistribution WHERE audience_demographics->'age_group' = '18-24' AND platform_name = 'Instagram';
SELECT platform_id, engagement_metrics FROM ContentDistribution WHERE engagement_metrics->>'likes' > '1000';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, audience_demographics, engagement_metrics FROM ContentDistribution WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ContentDistribution WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, JSON_VALUE(audience_demographics, '$.age_range') AS age_range FROM ContentDistribution WHERE JSON_VALUE(audience_demographics, '$.gender') = 'female';
SELECT platform_name, COUNT(platform_id) AS total_platforms FROM ContentDistribution GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT MAX(JSON_VALUE(engagement_metrics, '$.likes')) AS max_likes FROM ContentDistribution;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, content_type, content_id, distribution_channel FROM PlatformData;
SELECT platform_name, content_type, distribution_channel, platform_id, content_id FROM PlatformData;
SELECT * FROM PlatformData ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT platform_name, content_type FROM PlatformData WHERE content_type='video';
SELECT audience_id, gender, age_group, location FROM AudienceDemographics ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT platform_name, content_type FROM PlatformData WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, content_type, distribution_channel FROM PlatformData WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT platform_name, content_id, distribution_channel FROM PlatformData WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT platform_name, content_type, distribution_channel FROM PlatformData WHERE content_type = 'image';

SELECT AudienceDemographics.gender, AudienceDemographics.age_group, PlatformData.platform_name FROM AudienceDemographics JOIN PlatformData ON AudienceDemographics.platform_id = PlatformData.platform_id WHERE AudienceDemographics.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM platforms;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM platforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT audience_id, audience_age, audience_gender FROM audience_demographics WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT platform_name, audience_age FROM platforms p JOIN audience_demographics a ON p.platform_id = a.platform_id;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type FROM platforms;
SELECT audience_id, platform_id, audience_age, audience_gender FROM audience_demographics WHERE audience_age > 30;
SELECT engagement_id, platform_id, audience_id, views, likes, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND shares > 50;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type FROM platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type FROM platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Platforms;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM Platforms ORDER BY platform_type DESC;
SELECT audience_name, audience_gender FROM Audience WHERE audience_age > 30;
SELECT content_title, content_type, views FROM Content WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT metrics_id, likes, shares FROM Metrics WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Platforms;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM Platforms ORDER BY platform_type DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_type, platform_name FROM Content JOIN Platforms ON Content.platform_id = Platforms.platform_id WHERE Content.content_type = 'Video' ORDER BY content_title ASC;

SELECT Metrics.views, Metrics.likes, Metrics.shares, Content.content_title, Audience.audience_name FROM Metrics JOIN Content ON Metrics.content_id = Content.content_id JOIN Audience ON Metrics.audience_id = Audience.audience_id WHERE Metrics.likes > 1000 AND Audience.audience_age >= 18;

SELECT DISTINCT platform_name AS platform, COUNT(content_id) AS total_content FROM Content JOIN Platforms ON Content.platform_id = Platforms.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name HAVING total_content > 5 ORDER BY total_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM Platform;
SELECT audience_id, audience_name, age_range FROM Audience WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_type FROM Content WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_id, views, likes, comments, shares FROM Engagement ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM Metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Platform WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_type, platform_name FROM Content JOIN Platform ON Content.platform_id = Platform.platform_id;
SELECT audience_name, age_range, location FROM Audience WHERE age_range = '18-25';
SELECT content_title, views, likes, shares FROM Content JOIN Engagement ON Content.content_id = Engagement.content_id WHERE views > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM Metrics WHERE content_id = 1;
